alert.note: Alert for Clark; Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 9:20PM CDT until March 13 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Slick Roads As Snow Continues... .Snow will continue into early Sunday morning with visibility reduced to under a mile at times and snow rates exceeding 1/2 inch per hour. While the steadier snow should gradually diminish from the west overnight, additional accumulations are expected on Sunday, especially across north-central Wisconsin, but confidence in the exact location of this snow band is lower. Slow down and use extra caution if driving tonight or Sunday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts possible. * WHERE...Taylor and Clark Counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
